but i think this was the biggest racistme regime in the world and i know that this things happens everywhere in the world even today!!

The reason I collected these videos is that I remember hearing people speaking on tv that these events never happened.

I'm also certain that if these video records were not made, many people would simply dismiss it as rumor or propaganda.

I was necessary to record these events, and its necessary to make the knowledge availble to anyone that wants to see with their own eyes.

I am in no way blaming and Germans today, since most if not all who were to blame are long dead. 

As for the comment about britains, they abolished slavery way before many countries, and the spanish and porgese were among the worst involved in slave trade, but again, none of them are alive today.

The point is not to blame anyone, just remember and not let is happen again.

Suspect

Sorry for all the typos, my keyboard has a bad habit of doing what I type, not what I think...   :P

Suspect

ps. perhaps the fact that I need sleep is a factor too.

Hi Michael,

I have put together a third torrent, which is a mixture of things, including documentaries, footage, propaganda films, and even some cartoon footage for WW2 era.

I'm not sure when I will put the torrent up, but I will let you know when I do.

I was even going to include a copy of mien kamp, but then realized it had links to a white supremisist web site, so felt that would be poor taste to include.

I might still include it if I can remove the links.
